headline: Kimco Realty® Achieves ‘A3’ Credit Rating from Moody’s
summary: JERICHO, New York, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kimco Realty® (NYSE: KIM), a real estate investment trust (REIT) and leading owner and operator of high-quality, open-air, grocery-anchored shopping centers and mixed-use properties in the United States, today announced the company achieved an ‘A3’ credit rating with a stable outlook from Moody’s Ratings (“Moody’s”), placing Kimco among a select group of REITs with A-level ratings from the three largest ratings agencies. content.title: Kimco Realty® Achieves ‘A3’ Credit Rating from Moody’s
content.summary: JERICHO, New York, Dec. 03, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Kimco Realty® (NYSE: KIM), a real estate investment trust (REIT) and leading owner and operator of high-quality, open-air, grocery-anchored shopping centers and mixed-use properties in the United States, today announced the company achieved an ‘A3’ credit rating with a stable outlook from Moody’s Ratings (“Moody’s”), placing Kimco among a select group of REITs with A-level ratings from the three largest ratings agencies.
